description:
A small-scale environment project to work on photorealism and learn how to integrate Quixel Bridge into my workflow !

Workflow
- Assets modelled with Blender 3.6 or from Quixel Bridge
- Rendering with Cycles Optix - 1500.2000px
- Compositing with DaVinci Resolve 18.5

PC specifications
- 16 GB DDR5 memory
- Intel Core I7-12700H
- NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050

Software
- Blender 3.6
- DaVinci Resolve 18.5
